#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
 using namespace std ;
struct tt{
  int id;
  ll prod ;
}node[100002];

bool compare(const struct tt &a,const struct tt &b){
   if(a.prod==b.prod)
    return a.id>b.id;
    else
        return a.prod<b.prod;

}
int main(){

int t,n,i,j;
cin>>n;
ll n1,n2;
for(i=0;i<n;++i){
cin>>n1>>n2;
node[i].id = i+1;
node[i].prod = n1*n2;
}

sort(node,node+n,compare);
int q,ii;
cin>>q;
while(q--){
cin>>ii;
cout<<node[n-ii].id<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
